page.title: 17Leisure in 1985
page.content: Today we have much leisure time. Most people only work for 8 hours a day , sleep for 8 which leaves 8 hours for leisure.In that spare time there are a variety of pastimes to enjoy.One of the most popular is watching television.On average people watch 3 hours television each day.Then there is the video recorder which allows people to watch videos of the most popular films or record their favourite television programmes.Many children have their own computers on which they play games.This has meant the cinema is not as popular,though people go sometimes.There are also outdoor activities including football ,tennis,fishing and swimming.Adults pursue different pastimes.They go out to restaurants and local pubs.At weekends adults and children share leisure time on family outings
